title: Warning, for those who play lots and are nearing full time work life
body:
Rip

I just started full time work in the city (fair amount of travel, 1.5 hours up then the same back), went from playing as much as I like (more or less) to rarely. 

You'd think perhaps you could just play on your days off, but that's when everything else happens. The chores you put off all week, your dry cleaning, your washing, spending time with your friends/partner.. your skills decay soo fast. I assume i'd pick them up if I get some more time to play, but I don't get that time.

It's like you're watching yourself play just as you hit 30, only you know all the mistakes you're making and are constantly calling yourself a moron the entire game, wish i could mute my brain.

sads.

replies.body:
I know the feeling man, selling Rav's Magic Red Drinkâ„¢ is some hard work. Never have time for games, ~~always scamming for credit cards~~ selling a great and amazing product.

{{item:2037}}
That's why it's in limited supply! Buy nothing and get a second nothing within the next hour! Valued at $49.9999999999999!
rav seems to be on every post i go too!

I know the feel. This year I would work 12.5 hrs a day and then have 2 hrs to travel... everyday... 6 or 7 days a week depending on if I have a relative dying or a broken leg or have ebola. I'm 19 and live on my  own, SO I ALSO HAVE TO DO EVERYTHING AT HOME.. It's a crazy life hey... but after a few weeks i've picked things back up. I've only got around 9,000 hrs left till i master this game...xD trust me man... a 14.5 hr day 6-7 days a week no less... not even rdos... it's crayz. That adds up to around 80-90 hrs a ewek... then i have to get food etc. Life sucks xD
i work 60hrs a week still manage to find at least 2-3 hours a day to play league it aint hard (mind u im happy sleeping only 6 1/2 hrs a day as thats my natural sleep patten)

Mind you OP spends 3 hrs a day on a fekn travel, i work full time and live 5 mins from where i work, boom 2 hrs 50 mins free, i also have a social life during the week (maybe dont neglect friends/family just b/c its a week day) and i do chores during the week, sounds like OP lets his dishes pile up from mon-fri haha

> Mind you OP spends 3 hrs a day on a fekn travel, i work full time and live 5 mins from where i work, boom 2 hrs 50 mins free, i also have a social life during the week (maybe dont neglect friends/family just b/c its a week day) and i do chores during the week, sounds like OP lets his dishes pile up from mon-fri haha

You live 5 minutes away from your workplace? Must be McDonalds.
i live in a small town good sir, if you travel more than 5 minutes in any direction from my house you hit water, or stumble upon inbreeds in the woods :)
I do my dishes right after I eat, **f**uck letting them pile up it's a pain in the ass.
